feed.title: Track Awesome K6 Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome tools, content and projects using k6

entry.title: Awesome K6 Updates on Oct 21 - Oct 27, 2024
entry.content:
Tools

  • k6 for IntelliJ - IntelliJ-based Plugin to run and debug [sic!] k6 tests locally or in the k6 Cloud from your IntelliJ IDE.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Oct 21 - Oct 27, 2024

Extensions

  • Extension Registry - Curated listing of k6 extensions.

entry.title: Awesome K6 Updates on Jul 29 - Aug 04, 2024
entry.content:
Extensions / Official

  • xk6-client-tracing (‚≠ê56) - Client for load testing distributed tracing backends.
  • xk6-disruptor (‚≠ê110) - Inject faults to test üí£.
  • xk6-exec (‚≠ê26) - Run external commands.
  • xk6-kubernetes (‚≠ê70) - Interact with Kubernetes clusters.
  • xk6-loki (‚≠ê51) - Client for load testing Loki.
  • xk6-notification (‚≠ê22) - Create notifications.
  • xk6-output-influxdb (‚≠ê76) - Export results to InfluxDB v2.
  • xk6-output-kafka (‚≠ê26) - Export k6 results in real-time to Kafka.
  • xk6-output-timescaledb (‚≠ê33) - Export k6 results to TimescaleDB.
  • xk6-sql (‚≠ê156) - Load-test SQL Servers (PostgreSQL, MySQL and SQLite3 for now).
  • xk6-ssh (‚≠ê12) - SSH.

Extensions / Community

  • xk6-cable (‚≠ê28) - Test Action Cable and AnyCable functionality.
  • xk6-coap (‚≠ê16) - Interact with Constrained Application Protocol endpoints.
  • xk6-dotenv (‚≠ê33) - Load env vars from a .env file.
  • xk6-ethereum (‚≠ê11) - K6 extension for ethereum protocols.
  • xk6-faker (‚≠ê100) - Generate random fake data.
  • xk6-file (‚≠ê30) - Write files.
  • xk6-g0 (‚≠ê39) - Write k6 tests in golang.
  • xk6-kafka (‚≠ê182) - Load-test Apache Kafka. Includes support for Avro messages.
  • xk6-kv (‚≠ê23) - Share key-value data between VUs.
  • xk6-mock (‚≠ê14) - Mock HTTP(S) servers.
  • xk6-mqtt (‚≠ê55) - MQTT extension.
  • xk6-nats (‚≠ê14) - Provides NATS support for k6 tests.
  • xk6-opentelemetry (‚≠ê32) - Generate OpenTelemetry signals from within your test scripts.
  • xk6-output-elasticsearch (‚≠ê21) - Export results to Elasticsearch 8.x.
  • xk6-output-prometheus-pushgateway (‚≠ê14) - Export results to Prometheus pushgateway.
  • xk6-output-statsd (‚≠ê29) - Enables real-time output of test metrics to a StatsD service.
  • xk6-output-timestream (‚≠ê18) - Export results to AWS Timestream.
  • xk6-playwright (‚≠ê55) - Browser automation and end-to-end web testing using Playwright.
  • xk6-prometheus (‚≠ê52) - Prometheus HTTP exporter for k6.
  • xk6-prompt (‚≠ê16) - Support for input arguments via UI.
  • xk6-sse (‚≠ê26) - A k6 extension for Server-Sent Events (SSE).
  • xk6-tcp (‚≠ê19) - Send data to TCP port.
  • xk6-top (‚≠ê31) - Updating the current k6 metrics summaries on the terminal during the test run.
entry.summary: 34 awesome projects updated on Jul 29 - Aug 04, 2024

entry.title: Awesome K6 Updates on Jul 15 - Jul 21, 2024
entry.content:
Articles

  • Best practices organizing performance testing projects with k6 - Guidelines to scale your performance testing across multiple teams and projects.
    • Part 2 - JavaScript tools, shared libraries, and TypeScript - Stting up your k6 performance testing suite with JavaScript tools, shared libraries, and TypeScript.
  • Open source load testing tool review 2020 - Detailed comparison of the most popular open source load testing tools.
  • Load Testing Your API with Postman - How to use Postman collections to load test your API.
  • Load Testing SQL Databases with k6 - How to use the xk6-sql extension to test SQL databases directly.
  • Introducing TestRail in your K6 tests - Reporting k6 output to TestRail.
  • Testing shift left observability with the Grafana Stack, OpenTelemetry, and k6 - From the Grafana blog: a summary of Executive Director of Platform Engineering at JPMorgan Chase, Vinodh Ravi's talk at ObservabilityCON 2021.
  • Distributed Load Testing With K6 - Setting up distributed execution with k6-operator and Argo workflows.

Examples/Templates

  • k6 examples - A list of common examples on the k6 documentation.

CI/CD

  • k6 for CircleCI
  • k6 for GitLab

Extensions

  • k6 Extensions
entry.summary: 11 awesome projects updated on Jul 15 - Jul 21, 2024

entry.title: Awesome K6 Updates on Jan 15 - Jan 21, 2024
entry.content:
Examples/Templates

  • k6-template-es6 (‚≠ê89) - Starter template using Webpack and Babel to enable ES6 features in k6 tests.
  • k6-typescript-template (‚≠ê302) - Starter template using Webpack bundler to write k6 tests in TypeScript.
  • k6-rollup-example (‚≠ê12) - Example using Rollup to bundle k6 tests.
  • Jahmilli/k6-example (‚≠ê11) - Starter template using Vite (Rollup) bundler to write k6 tests in TypeScript.
  • agilob/multiscenario-tests - Running multiple scenarios at once.
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Jan 15 - Jan 21, 2024

entry.title: Awesome K6 Updates on Jan 08 - Jan 14, 2024
entry.content:
Articles

  • Streamlining Performance Testing with K6 and ChatGPT - Monish Correia writes k6 tests using GitHub co-pilot.

Videos

  • Playlist - What others says about k6
    • What is K6 & How to get started with k6 - Tutorial using k6 Extensions for Observability by "Is it Observable?"
    • Website Performance + Load Testing with K6 (k6.io) in 5 MINUTES! - Introductory overview of k6, showing how to create a test from a HAR file, by the DevOps Directive.
    • Performance Testing your web app with k6 - A walkthrough of the open-source load and performance regression testing tool, k6, and how to load test your APIs and websites, by Chris James.
    • Application Load Testing with k6 - Daniel Knittl-Frank @TechTalk Days 2021, Intro to k6.
    • Performance Testing From Zero to Hero with K6 & Azure - Jose Luis Latorre Millas at NDC Oslo 2021.
    • AI-Powered K6 Testing: No Code, No Hassle, Just ChatGPT! ü¶æüöÄ - In this video, Karthik K.K. demonstrates how ChatGPT can create k6 tests without writing a single line of code.

Examples/Templates

  • tom-miseur/k6-templates (‚≠ê36) - Opinionated starter templates for k6 projects.
  • SwissLife-OSS/k6-multiscenario-template (‚≠ê54) - Use K6 to implement a Multi Scenario template.
  • Im5tu/template-k6 (‚≠ê5) - A K6 Performance Test Suite Template.
  • mohsenny/k6-test-template (‚≠ê6) - Load testing framework.
  • kwidera/k6_framework (‚≠ê2) - Another k6 framework example.
  • Sahanipe/pet_store (‚≠ê2) - Modularized scripts for the Swagger PetStore APIs.
  • lreimer/continuous-k6k8s (‚≠ê18) - Continuously run k6 tests in Kubernetes using cronjobs.
  • luketn/docker-k6-grafana-influxdb (‚≠ê171) - Demonstrates how to run load tests with containerised instances of K6, Grafana and InfluxDB.

CI/CD

  • k6 for Azure Pipelines
  • k6 for Bamboo
  • k6 for Buddy
  • k6 for Flagger
  • k6 for GitHub Actions
  • k6 for Jenkins
  • k6 for Keptn
  • k6 for TeamCity
entry.summary: 18 awesome projects updated on Jan 08 - Jan 14, 2024

entry.title: Awesome K6 Updates on Nov 20 - Nov 26, 2023
entry.content:
Articles

  • Load testing with k6 and k8s - The Toucan DevOps team explains why they chose k6 as their load testing tool and how they deploy it on k8s.
  • CloudPosse's Load Testing Stack (‚≠ê56) - Load testing stack using k6, Grafana and InfluxDB.
  • Real-time stress: AnyCable, k6, WebSockets, and Yabeda - Evil Martians adding "real-time stress" with k6 and WebSockets.
  • Scaling Confidently with the Load and Fault Team - Robinhood on load testing a Kubernetes system with k6.

Extensions

  • GitHub Topic: xk6 - Explore k6 extensions tagged with the xk6 label.

Related / Community

  • How They Load Test (‚≠ê124) - A collection of resources on how companies around the world perform load testing.
  • Load Testing Toolkit (‚≠ê203) - A collection of open-source tools for debugging, benchmarking, load and stress testing your code or services.
  • awesome-http-benchmark (‚≠ê3.6k) - A collection of HTTP benchmark tools, testing/debugging, & restAPI (RESTful).
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Nov 20 - Nov 26, 2023
